review_title: Quality ingredients, good dosage and convenient size.
review_text: This Adrenal & Herbal Focus Blend - Astragalus Root, Tree Wart Herb, Ginkgo Leaf, Eleuthero Root, Gotu Kola Herb, Rhodiola Root, Licorice Root, Lavender Flower, Spearmint Leaf, Passion Flower Leaf - is formulated for those suffering from adrenal fatigue and brain. The body's stress response system involves numerous processes, and many of them occur in what is called the hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal axis or HPA axis. The adrenal glands, responsible for producing hormones that keep the body functioning normally, are an important part of this system. Adrenal Fatigue+ occurs when the stresses of life place too much stress on the hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal axis, reducing functionality and leading to emotional, mental, and physical fatigue. This powerful blend of adaptogenic nerve herbs can support this system, helping the body cope with stressors and calm nerves while supporting your ability to concentrate.
